member.name: IMFSecureChannel.GetCertificate
member.param: Receives a pointer to a buffer allocated by the object. The buffer contains the client's certificate. The caller must release the buffer by calling .
Receives the size of the ppCert buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSecureChannel.SetupSession
member.summary: Passes the encrypted session key to the client.
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that contains the encrypted session key. This parameter can be NULL.
Size of the pbEncryptedSessionKey buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSecureChannel
member.summary: Establishes a one-way secure channel between two objects.
